description:
The Next-Gen Collaboration Suite

Lark is a next-generation office suite that integrates messaging, schedule management, collaborative documents, video conferencing, and many more applications in a single platform.
Base
- When configuring an automation or workflow to send messages, you can choose to disable the button in the message once it's clicked. When this option is selected, and the action to perform is running a workflow or automation, you can further specify whether the button is disabled for all users or only the user who clicked the button.
